00010 
00016 bool strTokenizer( string &str, vector<string>& splitted, const string delimiter)
00017 {
00018     string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiter, 0);
00019 
00020     string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiter, lastPos);
00021 
00022   while (string::npos != pos || string::npos != lastPos)
00023     {
00024         splitted.push_back(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00025 
00026         lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiter, pos);
00027 
00028         pos = str.find_first_of(delimiter, lastPos);
00029     }
00030 
00031     return true;
00032 }
